title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1944/82 of 19 July 1982 amending Regulation (EEC) No 773/82 on detailed rules governing the distillation of table wine as referred to in Article 15 of Regulation (EEC) No 337/79
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1944/82
of 19 July 1982
amending Regulation (EEC) No 773/82 on detailed rules governing the distillation of table wine as referred to in Article 15 of Regulation (EEC) No 337/79
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 773/82 is hereby amended as follows:
1. In Article 1 (3), the date '31 August 1982' is replaced by '30 November 1982'.
2. In Article 7 (1), the date '15 July 1982' is replaced by '15 October 1982'.
3. In Article 8 (1), the date '1 October 1982' is replaced by '1 January 1983'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 July 1982.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 54, 5. 3. 1979, p. 1.
